title: Gone with the Wind
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: The manipulative daughter of a Georgia plantation owner conducts a turbulent romance with a roguish profiteer during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.

title: The Wizard of Oz
description: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home.

title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington
description: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.

title: Stagecoach
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.

title: Wuthering Heights
description: A foundling in 19th-century Yorkshire, raised by a wealthy family, falls in love with his foster sister, but their class differences incite a lifelong feud.

title: Ninotchka
description: A stern Russian woman sent to Paris on official business finds herself attracted to a man who represents everything she is supposed to detest.

title: The Rules of the Game
description: A bourgeois life in France at the onset of World War II, as the rich and their poor servants meet up at a French chateau.

title: Goodbye, Mr. Chips
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
description: An aged teacher and former headmaster of a boarding school recalls his career and his personal life over the decades.

title: The Roaring Twenties
description: Three men attempt to make a living in Prohibitionist America after returning home from fighting together in World War I.

title: Only Angels Have Wings
description: The manager of an air freight company in the Andes is forced to risk his pilots' lives in order to win a contract.

title: The Hunchback of Notre Dame
description: In 15th-century France, a gypsy girl is framed for murder by the infatuated Chief Justice, and only the deformed bellringer of Notre Dame Cathedral can save her.

title: Midnight
description: An unemployed showgirl poses as a Hungarian countess to crash Paris society and attracts the attention of a wealthy man and his suspicious wife.

title: Destry Rides Again
description: A deputy sheriff who doesn't like guns is called to tame the lawless town of Bottleneck.

title: The Women
description: A happily married woman lets her catty friends talk her into divorce when her husband strays.

title: Dark Victory
description: A flighty heiress discovers she has a brain tumor and has only months to live.

title: Young Mr. Lincoln
description: A fictionalized account of the early life of the American president as a young lawyer facing his greatest court case.

title: Le Jour se Lève
description: A foundry worker kills a man and barricades himself in his apartment, reflecting on the events that led him to the crime.

title: Of Mice and Men
description: Two itinerant migrant workers, one mentally disabled and the other his caretaker, take jobs on a ranch in the hopes of one day owning their own farm.

title: Gunga Din
description: Three British soldiers and their native water bearer face a Thuggee cult in 19th-century India.

title: Love Affair
description: A French playboy and an American woman fall in love aboard a ship, but tragedy strikes when they plan to reunite six months later.

title: The Four Feathers
description: A British officer resigns his commission just before his regiment is shipped out to battle, prompting his friends and fiancée to brand him a coward.

title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
description: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. Watson investigate the legend of a supernatural hound, a beast that may be stalking a young heir on the fog-shrouded moorland that makes up his estate.

title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
description: The master sleuth hunts his archenemy, Professor Moriarty, who is planning the crime of the century.

title: Son of Frankenstein
description: Baron Wolf von Frankenstein returns to his ancestral castle to vindicate his father but encounters his creation instead.

title: Beau Geste
description: Three adopted English brothers join the French Foreign Legion in North Africa to escape a scandal at home.

title: Bachelor Mother
description: A department store clerk is mistakenly identified as the mother of an abandoned baby.

title: Five Came Back
description: When a plane crashes in a jungle, the pilot must repair it while the passengers cope with the dangers.

title: Drums Along the Mohawk
description: Newlyweds Gil and Lana Martin try to establish a farm in the Mohawk Valley but are menaced by Indians and Tories as the Revolutionary War begins.

title: The Private Lives of Elizabeth and Essex
description: Queen Elizabeth I of England falls in love with the Earl of Essex, but their relationship is threatened by political intrigue.

title: Confessions of a Nazi Spy
description: An FBI agent exposes a Nazi spy ring operating in the United States on the eve of World War II.

title: The Story of the Last Chrysanthemums
description: The adopted son of a Kabuki actor, who is not very good at his craft, finds support and love from the wet nurse of his infant brother.

title: The Little Princess
description: A wealthy girl is placed in a seminary for young ladies, but when her father is reported missing in the Boer War, she is forced to work as a servant.

title: Another Thin Man
description: Nick and Nora Charles return with their new baby to investigate a murder at a country estate on Long Island.

title: Dodge City
description: A cattle agent in Dodge City, Kansas, takes on the job of sheriff to clean up the town.

title: The Old Maid
description: A woman's illegitimate child is raised by her cousin, unaware of her true parentage.

title: On Borrowed Time
description: Death comes for an old man but is tricked into climbing an apple tree, trapping him there and suspending death worldwide.

title: Each Dawn I Die
description: A reporter is framed for manslaughter and sent to prison, where he befriends a gangster and plots to clear his name.

title: The Cat and the Canary
description: Relatives of an eccentric millionaire gather in his spooky mansion on the 10th anniversary of his death for the reading of his will.

title: You Can't Cheat an Honest Man
description: Larson E. Whipsnade runs a shady circus while trying to stay one step ahead of the law and his creditors.

title: The Story of Vernon and Irene Castle
description: A biography of the famous dance team Vernon and Irene Castle, who became fashion icons and ballroom dancing stars.

title: They Made Me a Criminal
description: A boxer flees to Arizona after thinking he killed a man, where he joins a ranch for delinquents.

title: The Spy in Black
description: During WWI, a German U-boat captain is sent on a spy mission to the north of Scotland.

title: Q Planes
description: British secret service agents investigate the mysterious disappearances of new bomber planes.

title: Union Pacific
description: The struggle to build the first transcontinental railroad is hindered by Indians, saboteurs, and politicians.

title: The Rains Came
description: A diverse group of people in India are brought together by an earthquake and a flood.

title: Intermezzo
description: A famous violinist falls in love with his daughter's piano teacher, leading to an affair that threatens his marriage.

title: Jesse James
description: A fictionalized biography of the famous outlaw brothers Jesse and Frank James.

title: Gulliver's Travels
description: Lemuel Gulliver is shipwrecked on the island of Lilliput, where the tiny inhabitants are at war with a neighboring island.

title: The Man in the Iron Mask
description: The Three Musketeers attempt to rescue the twin brother of King Louis XIV, who is being held captive in the Bastille.

title: Made for Each Other
description: A young couple marries after a whirlwind romance, but then struggles with financial difficulties and disapproving in-laws.
